body.name: Rowenta Not Available ZD100 Non-Toxic Stainless Steel Soleplate Cleaner Kit for Steam Irons
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: Using the soleplate cleaner can improve the glide and make it easier to iron once build up from clothes, starch or melted synthetic fibers is removed
Simple, regular cleaning will keep the soleplate in its original condition and protect your iron
Safe to use on all types of soleplates.There is no expiration date for this item.
Set includes: 1-ounce tube of soleplate cleaner; application cloth; polishing/finishing cloth; instructions
Cleaner is non toxic ; Product outer packaging may vary as per stock availability
body.description: The rowenta zd100 soleplate cleaning kit contains a specially formulated cream that cleans soleplates by removing the draggy coating caused by excess starch, detergent build up and burned on synthetics. It is also ideal at removing melted webs, fusibles, iron on interfacings and trims. The cleaning kit is appropriate on all types of soleplates. Kit contains: 1-ounce tube of soleplate cleaner; application cloth; polishing /finishing cloth and set of instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on my gravity feed iron
reviews.reviewText: This works fantastic on the stainless steal plate of my gravity feed iron. Really gets off all the crud that accumulates. I like how it comes with a cotton cloth. After you apply the paste to the towel and rub your iron on it, I've found I don't need to add more paste, I can reuse the area on the towel a couple more times which makes it even more cost effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Always love this stuff. Keeps the soleplate of my iron clean and smooth. I do a lot of quilting so I need an iron that moves effortlessly across fabric. This helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This actually works
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product quite a while ago and didn’t get around to using it. I just tried it today and I’m amazed that it actually worked, and worked pretty quickly and easily. My iron had some light brown stains. Probably burned on starch. I followed the directions that came in the package, and the stains started immediately coming off. 95% of it came off really quickly. There were a couple of small spots that were a little stubborn. I kept working on it and they came off. I was left with one little area about the size of a pencil eraser that was still there. I ended up wrapping a small wooden skewer with the white Terry towel. I dabbed on a little bit of the cleaner and rubbed that part with the iron sitting up, being careful not to burn myself. Everything came off perfectly. It’s like a new iron again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did the trick for hard water buildup; easy and quick
reviews.reviewText: Arrived in a beat up box that looked like it had been sitting on a shelf for 20 years. But the product worked well. My iron soleplate was stained with heavy stubborn buildup from what I presumed was hard water calculus that appeared following a lengthy "session" with a damp press cloth. I wasn't convinced I hadn't ruined my iron. NOTHING else worked to get the buildup off. Gave this a try....worked beautifully. Used 2 applications of a 2 inch ribbon of the cream and all of the stains disappeared. Iron is back to ironing beautifully and glides well. I did it outdoors because I read reviews about smoking/fumes. I did not have this experience. Smoked a small amount (which is normal according to package), but nothing serious.Drawback: small amounts of the cream collected in the holes and did NOT come out using the steam burst function (per the instructions). Had to use a toothpick and small amounts remained. Ran iron over a clean cloth with heavy steam to ensure future fabric won't be affected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep it clean
reviews.reviewText: Works just as advertised. Use this before you transfer grunge onto a white shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps iron clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective iron cleaner- Easy, delivered on its promise!
reviews.reviewText: The sole plate of my relatively new Rowenta iron was accumulating a dark film from all of the ironing I have been doing as I work on a quilt project that has several fabrics that have some materials that are not very iron-friendly. Despite only ironing on the wrong side, the dark material was accumulating and was incredibly resistant to coming off.I was tempted to go with a different brand of iron cleaner chemical that was half the price, but the reviews I read indicated that the Rowenta system - gunk remover paste, remover cloth, and polishing cloth - were well worth the money.In less than 10 minutes of work, ALL of the nasty gunk came off of my iron and it looks like new again! The paste and cleaning towel system was super easy to use, had no unpleasant odor, and did not make a mess at all. I seriously could not be more happy! I needed to do two applications to get all of the dark residue off the iron, but it had been accumulating for several months. I still have enough paste to clean the iron at least 10 more times and the towels are very generous in size to complete multiple cleanings as well.MONEY WELL SPENT! This product works as promised :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use, does an Exellent job. Will buy again

Es ideal para limpiar la suela a la plancha roventa deja la superficie limpia de residuos y como nueva. Los trapos se pueden lavar en la lavadora. Es un poco pequeño el tubo de crema me lo esperaba mas grande .
My iron was burnt on the cloth due to high temperature. This kit removed it all !!!
Very expensive (25$) for the cleaning product. No name iron cleaners are 3.99. However it worked very well and saved my iron

Rowenta Iron Soleplate cleaning kit worked perfectly on my Rowenta SteamForce iron. Iron had some stains and draggy buildup. This kit includes a cleaner tube, a white cloth and a green cloth. Process is very easy and It takes only few minutes to clean the iron. All you have to do is (1) empty any water inside the iron and put iron on “Cotton” setting (2) put an old cloth on ironing board and put 2 folded white cloth and green cloth side by side on ironing board (3) put about 2 inches of cleaner on white cloth and move iron in circular motion. Iron is cleaned. (4) Now move iron on green cloth to remove any residual cleaner. And finally I cleaned iron with steam bursts just in case any cleaner is trapped in steam holes. Cleaning Clothes can be washed in laundry.Only reason for taking out one star is the price of the kit. It is quite excessive for what you get.
